newsitem.title: USA: CCB names Savage CFO, creates retail unit.
newsitem.headline: CCB names Savage CFO, creates retail unit.

text.p: CCB Financial Corp said on Monday that Robert Savage, its senior vice president, will assume the role of chief financial officer, effective April 1.
The company did not say whom Savage would replace and was not immediately available for further comment.
It said in a release that Savage would continue to direct the Asset/Liability management and Planning areas and assume responsibility for Finance/Accounting and Funds Management.
Additionally, the company said it has created a retail banking administration division to better focus its efforts in the retail banking area.
